00028 CKeyChooser::CKeyChooser(CSwordModuleInfo *, CSwordKey *, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00029     : QWidget(parent, name){
00030 }
00031 
00032 CKeyChooser* CKeyChooser::createInstance(CSwordModuleInfo *module, CSwordKey *key, QWidget *parent){    
00033 //  ASSERT(module);
00034 //  ASSERT(key);
00035     if (!module)
00036         return 0;
00037     switch ( module->type() ){
00038       case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:     //Bibles and commentaries uise the same key chooser
00039       case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00040         return new CBibleKeyChooser(module,key,parent);
00041       case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00042         return new CLexiconKeyChooser(module,key,parent);   
00043       case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00044         return new CBookKeyChooser(module,key,parent);
00045       default:
00046         return 0;
00047     }
00048 }
